name: Heartwork Clothing Summer Sampler Vol. 1
description: Hybrid Records presents Heartwork Clothing Summer Sampler Vol.1.  Thus CD contains great up and coming bands and supports the local scene all around the country. Some bands on this sampler include: The Re-birth, Honour Crest,The poison Written, Arise The Rider, St. Valentine's Day Massacre and many more. With each CD you will also recieve a free pin pack. Check this CD out and support local Music.
